5.11 The STREAMS module

outer-stream

Open generic function

Summary

Returns a stream's wrapper stream.

Signature

outer-stream stream => wrapping-stream

Arguments

stream
An instance of <stream>.

Values

wrapping-stream
An instance of <wrapper-stream>.

Library

io

Module

streams

Description

Returns the stream that is wrapping stream.

See also

inner-stream, page 72

outer-stream-setter, page 81

<wrapper-stream>, page 109

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
